Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] If 2 copies of "Ninjitsu Art of Super-Transformation" are activated in a Chain, both targeting the same monsters, the first copy of "Ninjitsu Art of Super-Transformation" will resolve correctly and Special Summon 1 Dragon, Dinosaur, or Sea Serpent-Type monster.  The second copy to resolve will resolve without effect since it cannot send monsters to the GY.\n2. [FORUM] If 2 copies of "Ninjitsu Art of Super-Transformation" are activated in a Chain, and both target a monster (but the other target is different), the first copy of "Ninjitsu Art of Super-Transformation" will Special Summon 1 Dragon, Dinosaur, or Sea Serpent-Type monster whose Level is less than or equal to the combined Levels of both monsters. The second "Ninjitsu Art of Super-Transformation" will summon 1 Dragon, Dinosaur, or Sea Serpent-Type monster whose Level is less than or equal to the Level of the 1 monster sent by its effect.
